## HandlerFunction type

A function that accepts a context object and an optional number of additional arguments. Used for the generic types in [IContextContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.icontextcontainer.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HandlerFunction<T extends object> = (context: T, ...args: any[]) => any;
```
